item.title: Faded white H line, 22nd April
item.description:
Across the driveway of 44 Painswick Road there is a very faded white line (H line). Please could you advise how to get this refreshed? There is a very prominent white H line a couple of houses further up the street which must have been repainted fairly recently. Are residents expected to request such activity or is there a rolling programme of repainting these? Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Painswick Road, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues
